job.title: Lead Software Engineer - 100% remote, eCommerce website
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br></u></strong><ul><li> This client is a high-growth, up and coming, eCommerce platform that focuses on creating products that are good for people and good for the environment. You will be in a high impact role where your code matters and has direct impact on the end-user.</li><li> The client is looking for a great Lead Engineer, Full stack with emphasis on the back end who can help build out their platform and lead a team.<br></li></ul>Role &amp; Responsibilities<br><ul><li> From ordering to customer accounts to product catalogs and pricing and commissions, you'll work across the sets of services and functionality we provide to customers.</li><li> The ideal candidate will be able to collaborate with our top-notch engineering team &amp; product managers, and build great services and features for our customers, and then work with our highly-skilled engineers in both code reviews and architecture discussions to help drive forward a cohesive code base.</li><li> Develop new backend functionality &amp; components.</li><li> Drive engineering efficiency improvements through build tooling, CI/CD pipeline improvements, architectural improvement, tech debt paydown, etc.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Skills &amp; Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li> 6+ years' experience building robust full stack functionality.</li><li> 5+ Years of Experience in T-SQL.</li><li> 2+ years leading teams/projects with iterative deliverables.</li><li> Cloud experience (GCP or AWS).<br></li></ul><strong><u>Benefits<br></u></strong><ul><li> $165-175k base salary with 10% annual bonus based on company performance.</li><li> 100% remote.</li><li> Full benefits.</li><li> Company shuts down the week of July 4th.<br></li></ul>If you are interested in this position, please email an updated copy of your resume to s.tholen@jeffersonfrank.com.
